text: You can be young without money but you can't be old without it.
author: Tennessee Williams

text: American men, as a group, seem to be interested in only two things, money and breasts. It seems a very narrow outlook.
author: Hedy Lamarr

text: I'm fulfilled in what I do. I never thought that a lot of money or fine clothes - the finer things of life - would make you happy. My concept of happiness is to be filled in a spiritual sense.
author: Coretta Scott King

text: It is a sad fact about our culture that a poet can earn much more money writing or talking about his art than he can by practicing it.
author: W. H. Auden

text: I've always said money may buy you a fine dog, but only love can make it wag its tail.
author: Kinky Friedman
